interface.name: zriver_window_manager_v1
interface.description: This protocol allows clients to recieve information about the current windowing state. It is useful to implement, for example, a status bar displaying information specific to the river compositor.

description.summary: sent when a view gains focus

event.name: output_windowing_state
event.description: Sent whenever the windowing state of an output changes. The output_name argument is the same as the name returned by the xdg-output protocol. Tags are sent as a bitfield, if a view has one of the focused tags set, then it is displayed on the output.

arg.name: output_tags
arg.summary: the currently focused tags of the output

arg.name: view_tags
arg.summary: the current tags of each view on the output
